Subskills.name: Everlasting Anger
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Backed by Rage
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Concussive Blow
Subskills.description: Butchers hook circles onces and slams into target location unleashing a corpse explosion with increased size and damage based on the amount of enemies captured in the hook.

Subskills.name: Hook Discharge
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Carcass Carrier
Subskills.description: Increases the size of butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Fresh Meat
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Pierce the Torso
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Spin of Death
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Welcome to Hell
Subskills.description: Unleash butchers hook towards target location with increased range and damage returning back after a short duration. Butchers hook no longer has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Hellsent
Subskills.description: Gain increased movement speed and phasing when using butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Immaculate Butcher
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Bring the Carnage
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of butchers hook.

Subskills.name: Critical Velocity
Subskills.description: Increases the velocity of butchers hook over time causing it to deal damage more frequently.
